title: 52 Bars
lyrics:
Yo [?]
Man like Ikky
Vaade karke na kade eh jubaan mukri
Jehde fukre ne muhro ohna de layi fukri
Hunn mitran nu shaunk hai ni race’an laun da ni
Ni meri khich la lagam mainu aankhe nukri
Chitti sohniye kabutri vi rakhi hoi ae
Kaali already mitran ne shakki hoi ae
Thoda dekh ke friend’an kar choose nakhro ni
Mainu tere naal di ne jhalli pakhi hoi ae
Sanu patdi ae sadgi na patte surkhi
Ni main suttan Mexico kude utha Turkey
Mera chef sun kehnda ajj ki khaoge ni
Dekh baitha main Dubai kude toda burki
Eh taan lokan nu hi chaleya ni luck lagea
Mera kinni waari dharti naal nakk lagea
Jadon hiq utte VVS shine kardi
Bhai pata lagda ke 22 lakh lagea
Aa je hip te clip biba mare sehnata
Manifest vi kare naale kara mehnata
Tainu pata hoju velli naa pyaar goriye
Ni tu ankh naal milawe laake rakhe ainaka
Assi peeth te ni hiq utte vaar karida
Aapan jealousy ni karde pyar karida
Oh aadi banuga ya record toduga
Banda assi jehde hisab naal taiyar karida
Kade gaya ni dhyan taan school’an te kude
Langi jandi Life bapu de asool’an te kude
Jithe mildi ni Matt Behas karda ni yaar
Chup bulla utte att kahton khulla te kude
Mera pehla pehla kandeya ne pair wadta
Mera time aaya kalla kalla kanda kadta
Kalle da hi rohb aa bhatera goriye
Ni taahi toleya ch mitran ne auna chadd’ta
Dekh gutt 41 millimeter kude
Dekh jatt thalle car 2 seater kude
Sawa lakh di si whiskey Macallan layi
Dass minute ch mukati ek litre kude
Haye ni tainu diary’an hi de doon behke folli varke
Lai jawi gyan biba kole khadke
Kaliyan di knowledge bhateri jatt nu ni
Halle likhda ni gane main kitaban padh ke
Kade socheya ni kinna utte chakke patshah
Khush rehne aa ni jithe sanu rakhe patshah
Esse kakre ni kade kitte jhooth boleya
Kyunki utte baitha dekhda ae sache patshah
Ni aa jo vi aa zameera dekh bal rahiya ne
Mainu ajj dass kal diya kal rahian ne
Kade kade chhevien nu chalava goriye ni
Dekh jatt diyan panj sense’an chal rahian ne
Jadon khet dikheya te aapan bauni sikh lai
Jadon mili mehbooba te brownie sikh lai
Overall taan halaat aap thik kare ni
Ni roti pakki ni mili te appan launi sikh lai
I know you motherfuckers been waiting for a minute
You know what I'm sayin', you here for the bars (Man like Ikky)
This ain't your regular album
It's that motherfucking Doaba shit
It's that I flew 7 thousand miles from Punjab shit
Now this shit 'bout to start
So fellas grab your drink and spark your- (*lighter sparks*)
Its that motherfucking Karan Aujla gonna steal your girl type shit
Motherfucker
(Esse kakre ni kade kitte jhooth bolea
Kyunki utte baitha dekhda ae sache patshah)

title: Bewajah
lyrics:
Yaadon ki qaid mein
Geeraftaar ho gaya dil
Darbadar ishq mein
Taar taar ho gaya dil

Yaadon ki qaid mein
Geeraftaar ho gaya dil
Darbadar ishq mein
Taar taar ho gaya dil

Bewajah nahi milna tera mera
Rehnuma, rehnuma, rehnuma..
Bewajah nahi milna tera mera
Rehnuma, rehnuma, rehnuma..

Yaadon ki qaid mein
Giraftaar ho gaya dil
Darbadar ishq mein
Taar taar ho gaya dil

Bewajah nahi milna tera mera
Rehnuma, rehnuma, rehnuma..

Kisi aur ko tu chaahe
Kisi aur ko tu soche
Iss dil ko nahi ye gawara hai

Furqat ka sharara hai
Kaisa angara hai
Teri tishngi ne mujhe maara hai

Bewajah nahi milna tera mera
Rehnuma, rehnuma, rehnuma..
Bewajah nahi milna tera mera
Rehnuma, rehnuma, rehnuma..

Rahe saath adhoorapan
Chaahe main jahaan bhi rahoon
Kahin sabr na mujhe aata hai

Meri berang duniya mein
Mere saath tera hona
Mujhe raahat kyun de jaata hai

Bewajah nahi milna tera mera
Rehnuma, rehnuma, rehnuma..

Yaadon ki qaid mein
Giraftaar ho gaya dil
Darbadar ishq mein
Taar taar ho gaya dil

Bewajah nahi milna tera mera
Rehnuma, rehnuma, rehnuma..
Bewajah nahi milna tera mera
Rehnuma, rehnuma, rehnuma..

title: Tell Me [OFFICIAL SONG]
artist: Karan Aujla, OneRepublic, Disha Patani, Ikky
lyrics:
[Chorus: Ryan Tedder]
Ouuu tell me, tell me, tell me
Ouuu tell me, tell me, tell me
I know love ain't always free
You got a mind that I just can't read
So you gotta-gotta-gotta tell me

[Verse 1: Karan Aujla]
Tenu suit mein Lahore toh liyaiya je paa laingi tan dasde ni (Tell me)
Je ni ready aje koi gal ni je naa laingi tan dasde ni (Tell me)
Tenu suit mein Lahore toh liyaiya je paa laingi tan dasde ni (Tell me)
Asi karde aa dillon goriye je chaa laingi tan dasde ni

[Verse 2: Ryan Tedder, Karan Aujla]
I'm not tryna sell you, tryna tell you what it is
Wanna give you everything but don't be on the fence
Naazak aa dil sada torhi na dekhi
Pyaar naal liyaiya suit morhi na dekhi

[Pre-Chorus: Karan Aujla, Ryan Tedder, Both]
(Oho) Hun teri haan ya naa dasde
(Oho) Paa laingi jaan ya naa dasde

[Chorus: Ryan Tedder]
Ouuu tell me, tell me, tell me
Ouuu tell me, tell me, tell me
I know love ain't always free
You got a mind that I just can't read
So you gotta-gotta-gotta tell me

[Post-Chorus: Ryan Tedder]
(Gotta tell me, gotta tell me, gotta tell me)
So you gotta-gotta-gotta tell me
(Gotta tell me, gotta tell me, gotta tell me)

[Verse 3: Karan Aujla]
Tere bullan kolo puch eh swaal tere naal tera yaar kharha jachda ke nyi das
Tere kannan naal sun eh jwaab sade naam to zamana saara machda ke nyi das
Meinu rakh le tu naal jiven rakhdi rumaal ya mein banja taweet teri hikk da
Asi kure teri lor ch magane asi mannde shagan teri maari hoyi shikk da

[Pre-Chorus: Karan Aujla, Ryan Tedder, Both]
(Oho) Hun teri haan ya naa dasde
(Oho) Paa laingi jaan ya naa dasde

[Chorus: Ryan Tedder]
Ouuu tell me, tell me, tell me
Ouuu tell me, tell me, tell me
I know love ain't always free
You got a mind that I just can't read
So you gotta-gotta-gotta tell me

[Post-Chorus: Ryan Tedder]
(Gotta tell me, gotta tell me, gotta tell me)
So you gotta-gotta-gotta tell me
(Gotta tell me, gotta tell me, gotta tell me)
So you gotta-gotta-gotta tell me

[Instrumental Interlude]

[Chorus: Ryan Tedder, Karan Aujla]
Ouuu tell me, tell me, tell me
Hayee dasde, dasde, tell me
I know love ain't always free
You got a mind that I just can't read
So you gotta-gotta-gotta tell me

title: Mi Amor - Perfectly Slowed
lyrics:
Haye sachi kure dassa tere nakhre da tor ni
Oh aashiq banaya sanu layi kadi lorr ni
Bulliya te hassa tera kure maar janda ae ni
Sanu dass janda gall lambi challu hor ni
Oh gabru nu billo kehre chakra ch paya
Haye sachi tainu sama laake rabb ne banaya
Ni kada sanu ishq ch apne tu laya
Oh naina naal sooli utte chade goriye
Haye langdi ne akh c jo mari goriye
Ni sachi odo disde c taare goriye
Oh sangdi te zulfa naa firre kheddi
Haye poora ni tu kehar guzare goriye
Haan langdi ne akh c jo mari goriye
Ni sachi odo disde c taare goriye
Oh sangdi te zulfa naa firre kheddi
Haye poora ni tu kehar guzare goriye
Oh piche piche aava tere nitt ni
Haye pairi tere jhanjra v paun sanu khich ni
Haye khich jo tu pauni ae ni pyar ch fasauni ae
Ni kinj lava naina de ishareye to jitt ni
Haye billo tere karke maade kam c mai shadte
Ni jehra karda c ungla te town run
Takkya jo tainu fr bhule kamm sare goriye
Haye langdi ne akh c jo mari goriye
Te sachi odo disde c taare goriye
Oh sangdi te zulfa naa firre kheddi
Haye poora ni tu kehar guzare goriye
Haan langdi ne akh c jo mari goriye
Ni sachi odo disde c taare goriye
Oh sangdi te zulfa naa firre kheddi
Haye poora ni tu kehar guzare goriye
Oh khichdi ae photoan te pave jo storiyan
Haye dil kare tainu baar baar takkla
Kite ho na java door is gall to daran ni
Tainu sohniya mai dil ch lukka ke rakhla
Meet diya likhtan ch tera hi zikar
Sachi khud naalo zaada kare tera hi fikar
Jehra bachda c billo ina kamma to ni bass
Teri sang kolo haare goriye
Haye langdi ne akh c jo mari goriye
Ni sachi odo disde c taare goriye
Oh sangdi te zulfa naa firre kheddi
Haye poora ni tu kehar guzare goriye

Ni sachi odo disde c taare goriye

title: O Rangrez
lyrics:
Oh rangrez
Oh rangrez, tere rang dariya mein
Oh rangrez, tere rang dariya mein
Doobna hai bas tera banke, haaye
Nahi rehna dooja ban ke
Ek bhi saans alag nahi leni
Ek bhi saans alag nahi leni
Khench lena praan iss tan ke, haaye
Nahi rehna dooja ban ke

[Chorus: Shreya Ghoshal]
Apne hee rang mein, mujhko rang de
Dheeme-dheeme rang mein, mujhko rang de
Saundhe-saundhe rang mein, mujhko rang de
Rang de na, rang de na, rang de na
Oh, Apne hee rang mein, mujhko rang de
Dheeme-dheeme rang mein, mujhko rang de
Saundhe-saundhe rang mein, mujhko rang de
Rang de na, rang de na, rang de na

[Instrumental Break]

[Verse 1: Javed Bashir, Shreya Ghoshal]
Ghunghroo hai tu, main to hoon paanv piya
Chha-na-na-na-nan
Peepal tu, main to hoon chhanv piya
Tabhi hoon magan
Ho, naino mein bas chhab teri lehraye
Chhalke, chhalke, chhalke re
Barse halke-halke
Apne hee rang mein

[Chorus: Shreya Ghoshal]
Ho, apne hee rang mein, mujhko rang de
Dheeme-dheeme rang mein, mujhko rang de
Saundhe-saundhe rang mein, mujhko rang de
Rang de na, rang de na, rang de na

[Instrumental Break]

[Verse 2: Javed Bashir, Shreya Ghoshal]
Maala mein aa, tujhko piro loon
Tujhe pehnu sajan
Honthon mein aa, sargam sa bolu
Tujhe rat loon sajan
Sajan, tees meri pees de
Mujhmein hee ghul ja, mil ja, mil ja, sajna
Pighal ke mil ja, mil ja
Apne hee rang mein, ho

[Chorus: Shreya Ghoshal]
Apne hee rang mein, mujhko rang de
Dheeme-dheeme rang mein, mujhko rang de
Saundhe-saundhe rang mein, mujhko rang de
Rang de na, rang de na, rang de na

[Refrain: Javed Bashir, Shreya Ghoshal]
Ni-dha-pa, ga-re-sa
Ni-dha-pa, ga-re-sa
Ni-ma-ga-re-ga-re-sa
Oh rangrez, oh rangrez
Oh rangrez, tere rang dariya mein
Oh rangrez, tere rang dariya mein
Doobna hai bas tera banke, haaye
Nahi rehna dooja banke

[Chorus: Javed Bashir, Shreya Ghoshal]
Apne hee rang mein, mujhko rang de
Dheeme-dheeme rang mein, mujhko rang de
Saundhe-saundhe rang mein, mujhko rang de
Rang de na, rang de na, rang de na
Oh, apne hee rang mein, mujhko rang de
Dheeme-dheeme rang mein, mujhko rang de
Saundhe-saundhe rang mein, mujhko rang de
Rang de na, rang de na, rang de na

title: ROOTS
lyrics:
Yeah, Aujla
Pichhe dekh ke kataar, naddi karke pyaar kehndi— (ha-ha)

[Refrain]
Hun neend nahi aundi
Pachtaundi tu laa ke yaari jattan de munde naal
Firre roundi ni gaddiyaan track te
Munde toliyaan bana ke sandh back te
Ni thukda ni modde ton spit karaan mic te
Lagi meri mag te main hikkaan vich vajda
Ae bukkde aa back te kyon samajh nai aundi

[Chorus]
Pata chaundi tu laake yaari jattan de munde naal
Hun kehndi firre neend ni aundi

[Verse 1]
Shakkan roti vand ke te vairi rakha chand ke
Bade sanu nind de te bade sanu bhand de
Eh yaar mere sandh te zuban
Sambhe yaarian te vairi thalle dand de

[Pre-Chorus]
Aivein ni jama launde (Launde)
Na hi aunde gali ch bahaan kithe eh hath ni fadaunde
Tu hath ni chadaundi

title: Vele-SOTY
lyrics:
Assi vele, Sab vele,
Aa vela ho ja re.
Assi vele, Sab vele,
Aa vela ho ja re.
Assi vele, Sab vele,
Aa vela ho ja re.
Assi vele, Sab vele,
Aa vela ho ja re.

HoOon, motoron mein dhichik dhichik,
Kedi shedi maarein.
Fursaton ko dhuaan dhuaan,
Karke shaam udaade.
Kar rahein badmaashiyaan,
Bole uncle auntiyaan.
Apni aisi yaariyaan,
Duniya pe mitti paaye!

Saanu vele kehnde, Saanu ki.
Assi kehnde hi rehnde, Saanu ki.
Inna shining shining future,
Sadda bright si.
Saanu vele kehnde, Saanu ki.
Bas kehnde hi rehnde, Saanu ki.
Oye mitraan de sang,

Sab kuch alright siii….
Track uploaded by @__aarti__

Oh! tadi tadi apni aisi hai,
Ke tuk tuk saare dekhenge.
Oh! badi badi aankhien kholenge,
Deewana humko bolenge.
Yaar hai apne favour mein,
Ghoome hain phir toh tevar mein.
Changi saariyaan, Apni yaariyaan,
Hain forever hoye!
Ho! Botalon mein peg sheg daale,
Car-bar banake.
Um! Veikhenge hum totta-shotta
Peeke do patiaale!

Saanu vele kehnde, Saanu ki.
Assi kehnde hi rehnde, Saanu ki.
Inna shinin shining future
sadda bright si.
Saanu vele kehnde, Saanu ki.
Bas kehnde hi rehnde, Saanu ki.
Oye mitraan de sang
Sab kuch alright si...
You think you're fast
But I know I'm faster
I'm as cool. Yo!
All! I’m a party ninja master
Who can strike
Like you never imagine
Drop the boom
From a million fathoms!!
Up in the sky
Down to the ground
It’s the new Ssh!
It’s the new sound
Grab somebody sexy
Spin her around
To you it’s a’last
A baby girl you found
Show all the ladies
Some tender loving care
Lead 'em to the floor
Throw your glass up in the air
This is how we do it
This is how it's done
We’re the velas
Second to none!

Oh! dil mein, topein chalti hain.
Oh! dhadkan, gotey khaati hain.
Oh! vaare nyaare hote hain.
Jo hum se ankh ladh jaati hai.
Karti hain, kissy vissy oye
Kehti hain, miss you miss you oye
Dil ko haarti, Jaan nisaarti.
Sab muttiyaare hoye!-eee
Ladkiyon ke, nedhe tedhe.
Gaddi tez chalaake.
Karte hain hum, hello, bye bye.
Paun paun horn bajaake.

Saanu vele kehnde, Saanu ki.
Assi kehnde hi rehnde, Saanu ki.
Inna shining shining future,
Sadda bright si.
Saanu vele kehnde, Saanu ki.
Bas kehnde hi rehnde, Saanu ki.

Aa vela ho ja re.
Assi vele, Sab vele,
Aa vela ho ja re.
Assi vele, Sab vele,
Aa vela ho ja re.

Aa vela ho ja re.
